segments.text: Did you hear what happened to Mike last night ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , apparently he had too much to drink and got into some kind of trouble . Typical , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , no . What kind of trouble ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I don't know the details , but ...
segments.speaker: S1
